entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix all of inline temporary with multiple #region directives duplicates a directive #62805
  • Recover HostObjectType from checksums when creating ProjectInfo in remote workspace #62804
    Backlog
  • Cannot cast to `nint` or `nuint` right after getting the address of a symbol #62798
  • API proposal: GeneratorDriver.ReplaceGenerators #62796
  • Stack overflow in lookup #62795
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62791
    17.4
  • Improve ERR_InaccessibleSymbol2 VB diagnostic #62790
  • `RemoveUnnecessarySuppressionExclusions` shouldn't have roaming location or should be exposed in UI #62784

Closed

  • Find All References doesn't find all references of a type parameter in a generic method. #62744
    17.4
  • When moving/renaming a file/folder the namespace should be renamed automatically #48443
    Backlog
  • Gold bars appear in VS when modifying a conditional expression and lambdas #61013
    Compiler.Next
  • Unchecked `nuint->nint` conversion should emit no conversion #60944
    17.4
  • UseExpressionBodyCodeFixProvider encountered error and has been disabled - VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 3.0 #62739
    17.4
  • CompletionProvider.GetChangeAsync is not called for NuGet-based completion provider #46803
    17.3
  • CompletionProvider descriptions not working #61950
    17.3
  • Using SourceGenerators leads to CS0016 when path is too long #62544

PullRequests

Created

  • PR feedback on lightweight rename OOP work. #62803
    Area-IDE
  • Improve circularity analysis in bases for some scenarios. #62799
    Area-Compilers
  • validation build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove support for 'ref scoped' #62788
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused OptionDefinition.IsPerLanguage #62786
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove roaming storage from `RemoveUnnecessarySuppressionExclusions` #62785
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support RefEscapesAttribute #62783
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Change rename/inline-rename to no longer marshal symbols from OOP to the host when operating. #62800
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62802
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62801
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Find references to type-parameters used in object-creation expressions. #62752
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62792
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • windows build optimizations #62336
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62793
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • No need to roundtrip symbol when doing OOP rename call. #62789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused parameter #62685
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix NRE in nullable walker #62773
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Delete obsolete internal options #62746
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Optimize away unchecked conversions between nint and nuint types. #62774
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, Next
  • Move our C# syntax generator over to be an IIncrementalGenerator #62682
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use actual equivalence keys, not loc strings to distinguish helpers #62740
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow lightbulbs to make text changes, even if an intermediary workspace change occurred. #62775
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify find refs helpers #62755
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Generate ReadyToRun binaries for OOP #62518
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense, Next
  • Clean up global options usage in tests #62692
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62770
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62809
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62808
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62807
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Use the prior cached state for the Razor generator in later runs #62219
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve SyntaxTree/Node.Dump() #62703
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Allow for Parsing Lambda Default Parameters #62782
    Area-Compilers
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Clear ValueTracking on solution close #61815
    Area-IDE
  • Move UseExpressionBodyForLambda to Analyzers layer #62675
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use the correct option for splitting comments #62680
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unneeded 'using OptionSet = ...' #62769
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Rename `IPerLanguageOption` and `ILanguageSpecificOption` and add LanguageName property #62766
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" #62759
    Area-IDE
